com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller

Class SBEditUsersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBEditUsersController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBEditUsersController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/edit/users/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

        @Autowired
public SBEditUsersController(SBPersonDao personDao,
                                         SBUserDao userDao,
                                         SBUserCustomDao userCustomDao,
                                         SBExpenseDao expenseDao,
                                         SBLoanDao loanDao,
                                         SBTaxDao taxDao,
                                         SBUserValidator userValidator,
                                         SBUserPersonValidator personValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        personDao - It provides methods related with 'sbperson' table from database.
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        userCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        expenseDao - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense' table from database.
        loanDao - It provides methods related with 'sbloan' table from database.
        taxDao - It provides methods related with 'sbtax' table from database.
        userValidator - It validates SBUser object fields.
        personValidator - It validates SBPerson object fields.
